Now you need to respond to the Indian card played by your opponent. 
You have two options (bang, pass) In the first case you won't take damage, but you will drop a card bang,
in the second case you will lose a unit of health. Make your choice based on your current health. 
Reply in JSON format of the following structure:

{
  “your_reflection": <Your thoughts on which option to choose>,
  "say_to_all": <What you have to say for all players. You can use this text to confuse other players or to
   team up with someone to win the game. If there is nothing to say, do not add this field>
  “result": <Enter the respond from to options (bang, pass)>
}

```json

  "your_reflection": "Since I have a 'miss' card in my hand, I can afford to play a 'bang' in response to the Indians card without losing a critical card. This will allow me to preserve my health and maintain my current position in the game. Additionally, as a Bandit, my primary goal is to eliminate the Sheriff, so conserving health is important for future attacks.",
  "say_to_all": "Looks like the Sheriff is trying to thin out our resources early. Everyone, be careful with your responses—don’t let them dictate the pace of the game!",
  "result": "bang"
}
```

Make sure you take into account who's shooting at you.

You have two options (bang, pass) In the first case you won't take damage, but you will drop a card bang,
in the second case you will lose a unit of health. Make your choice based on your current health. 
Reply in JSON format of the following structure:

{
  “your_reflection": <Your thoughts on which option to choose>,
  "say_to_all": <What you have to say for all players. You can use this text to confuse other players or to
   team up with someone to win the game. If there is nothing to say, do not add this field>
  “result": <Enter the respond from to options (bang, pass)>
}

```json
{
  "your_reflection": "I'm at 3 HP with only one 'bang' card left. If I use it to respond to the Indians card, I'll be left defenseless against future attacks. However, losing 1 HP would put me at 2 HP, which is still manageable. The Sheriff and Anna are clearly coordinating against me, so I need to conserve my resources. I'll take the hit now to keep my last 'bang' card for a crucial moment against the Sheriff.",
  "say_to_all": "Sheriff, you and your deputy are working hard to take me down, but I'm not out yet! Bandits, if you're out there, now's the time to strike - I can't hold them off alone forever!",
  "result": "pass"
}
```
